          <title>
            <string language="en">Penicillium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Penezilin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Penicillium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Penicillium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Penicillium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Penicillium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Penicillium</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a drop of penicillium in a culture of bacteria.  The white ring around the penicillium is a region where bacteria are depleted.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">penicillium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">petri dish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">micro-organism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen Tropfen des Penezilins
in einer Kultur des Bakteriums. Der weiße Ring um das Penezilin
ist eine Region, in der Bakterium verbraucht wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une baisse de penicillium dans
une culture des bactéries. La boucle blanche autour du 
penicillium est une région où des bactéries sont épuisées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma gota do penicillium em 
uma cultura das bactérias. O anel branco em torno do 
penicillium é uma região onde as bactérias sejam esgotadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una goccia di penicillium in 
una coltura dei batteri. L'anello bianco intorno al penicillium 
è una regione dove i batteri sono esauriti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια απελευθέρωση 
penicillium σε έναν πολιτισμό των βακτηριδίων. Το άσπρο 
δαχτυλίδι γύρω από penicillium είναι μια περιοχή όπου τα 
βακτηρίδια μειώνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una gota del penicillium en 
una cultura de bacterias. El anillo blanco alrededor del 
penicillium es una región donde se agotan las bacterias.</string>
          </description>
